document_name_accent: viem tuyen tien liet man tinh.json
subsection_content:
Chronic prostatitis is a long-term urinary disease that is difficult to completely treat. Patients will experience symptoms similar to acute prostatitis with greater intensity. Besides, they also have to deal with erectile dysfunction and reduced fertility.
These symptoms may appear continuously or in certain cycles. Symptoms of chronic prostatitis include:
Pain in the area between the scrotum and anus; Pain in the lower back, penis, testicles, rectum, or inner thighs; Burning pain when urinating, unusual changes in urination frequency (more or less); Pain during ejaculation; Fever in case the patient has chronic prostatitis caused by bacteria
subsection_title: viem tuyen tien liet man tinh.json. Symptoms of chronic prostatitis
subsection_data:
